titles.title: Small Business Investment Company Capital Act of 2003
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to modify the unrelated business income limitation on investment in certain debt-financed properties.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 2/12/2003--Introduced. Small Business Investment Company Capital Access Act of 2003 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from the definition of "acquisition indebtedness" specified debt-financed indebtedness incurred by a small business investment company.
